document_data.name: Flute
document_data.mainbody: '''Flutes''' were common and portable musical instruments. They were often favored by [[bard]]s.
document_data.Availability:
* [[Black Dugal's Music Shoppe]] in the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] was known to sell flutes.{{Cite polyhedron/56/The Living City: Black Dugal's Music Shoppe|24}}
* Several members of the [[Waterdhavian]] noble house [[Majarra]] produced instruments, including flutes and longhorns.{{Cite dragon/335/New Olamn Bard College|26}}
document_data.Varieties:
* [[Birdpipes]]
* '''Fipple pipe''', a variety of flute found in the kingdom of [[Hartsvale]]. It was held vertically and played by blowing into its end.<ref>
* [[Longhorn]]
* [[Songhorn]]
document_data.Notable Flutes:
* ''[[Fife of blasting]]'', [[enchanted]] flutes that produced an effect similar to ''[[sound burst]]''.
* ''[[The Merry Shorthorn]]'', a renowned enchanted flute.<ref>
* ''[[Ruehar's flute]]'', a magical [[silver]] flute that belonged to the [[wood elf]] [[wizard]] [[Ruehar]] and passed on to his descendants.
* ''[[Sorlyn's Ditty]]'', an enchanted flute that was created for [[Sorlyn Sheerla]].

Notable Users of Flutes.Individuals:
* The [[drow]] wizard [[Dostrealt]] carried a flute and a [[piccolo]].
* Sorlyn Sheerla, a [[cleric]] of the [[Faerûnian pantheon|Faerûnian deity]] of song, [[Milil]].
* [[Taran Goldenstar]], a [[wizard]] in [[Freedale]], often played a flute outside him home.
Notable Users of Flutes.Nations, Regions, & Settlements: * Flutes made from reeds were a common instrument on the [[Malatran Plateau]].<ref>{{Cite polyhedron/102/Heroes of Malatra|14}}
Notable Users of Flutes.Races & Sentient Creatures: * [[Banshrae]], a dangerous and musically inclined race of [[fey]], always carried a masterwork flute that doubled as a [[blowgun]].
Notable Users of Flutes.Religions: * It was common for [[cleric]]s of [[Eilistraee]] to be proficient with flutes, as well as [[harp]]s and [[horn]]s.
